Song.title: Prepared A Place For Me
Song.copyright: Music & Words by Doug Plank © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D | G D | Bm A | D]
Verse 1: [D]Mystery of mysteries, that [G]God would make for [D]me A [Bm]place within His family, though [A]once His enemy The [D]Judge of every sinner{,} sent [G]Christ to Calva[D]ry To pre[Bm]pare a [A]place for [D | D]me
Verse 2: [D]Judgment should be given{,} for this [G]guilt upon my [D]head But the [Bm]Father of all glory{,} [A]crushed His Son instead [D]Now I’ve been adopted,{,} for [G]God made this to [D]be You pre[Bm]pared a [A]place for [D]me
Chorus: [G]Bles[D]sed [A]be,[D] [G]bles[D]sed [A]be [D] My [Em]God [D]and Sa[A/C#]vior,{,} You’ve [D]shown [A]me fa[G]vor And pre[Em7]pared a [Asus]place for [D | G/D D | Bm A | D]me
Verse 3: [D]Father, in the moment When Your [G]Son shall split the [D]skies And [Bm]myriads of angels{,} ac[A]claim Him with their cries By [D]grace I will be able to [G]join the jubi[D]lee You pre[Bm]pared a [A]place for [D]me
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 mystery of mysteries that god would make for me a place within his family though once his enemy the judge of every sinner sent christ to calvary to prepare a place for me verse 2 judgment should be given for this guilt upon my head but the father of all glory crushed his son instead now ive been adopted for god made this to be you prepared a place for me chorus blessed be blessed be my god and savior youve shown me favor and prepared a place for me verse 3 father in the moment when your son shall split the skies and myriads of angels acclaim him with their cries by grace i will be able to join the jubilee you prepared a place for me
